verbs.description: [ARG0: The former Republican National Committee chairman Michael Steele] [V: slammed] [ARG1: Donald Trump] [ARGM-TMP: on Saturday] , [ARGM-PRD: claiming that he " sounds stupid " when he tries to diminish football players for protesting against police brutality and racial injustice against black people] .
